name: Minifantasy Miniquiz
description:
Minifantasy MiniQuiz is a super-short trivia game about Minifantasy assets!

I made Minifantasy MiniQuiz as part of GameDev.TV's "Complete C# Unity Game Developer 2D Online Course - 2021" Quiz Master section. The section teaches some fundamental C# while going over the basics for the Canvas and its common components.

Minifantasy is a super low-res (8x8px) asset collection. Krishna, the creator of Minifantasy, has built a wonderful discord community where patreons can interact and share about game development.
